definitions.definition: A carpenter 's tool for boring holes longer than those bored by a gimlet .
A snake or plumber's snake ( plumbing tool ) .
A tool used to bore holes in the ground, e.g. for fence posts
A hollow drill used to take core samples of soil, ice, etc. for scientific study.

main_definition: A carpenter 's tool for boring holes longer than those bored by a gimlet .
